Uses of Package
io.permazen.util

Packages that use io.permazen.util
Package
Description
io.permazen.cli.config
Classes for parsing command line flags in order to configure a Permazen command line interface (CLI) session.
io.permazen.cli.parse
Permazen parsing related classes.
io.permazen.cli.parse.util
Permazen parsing utility classes.
io.permazen.core
Core classes for the Permazen Java persistence layer.
io.permazen.core.util
Permazen core API utility classes.
io.permazen.encoding
Permazen Encodings.
io.permazen.index
Permazen index classes.
io.permazen.kv
byte[] array key/value store API and related utility classes.
io.permazen.kv.array
A simple KVStore implementation based on a sorted array of key/value pairs.
io.permazen.kv.bdb
KVDatabase implementation based on Oracle's Berkeley DB Java Edition.
io.permazen.kv.caching
Caching KVStore and KVDatabase layers.
io.permazen.kv.fdb
KVDatabase implementation based on FoundationDB.
io.permazen.kv.leveldb
KVDatabase implementation based on LevelDB.
io.permazen.kv.lmdb
KVDatabase implementation based on LMDB.
io.permazen.kv.mvcc
Utility classes for MVCC type operations using a KVStore.
io.permazen.kv.mvstore
AtomicKVStore and KVDatabase implementations based on H2 MVStore.
io.permazen.kv.raft
A distributed KVDatabase based on the Raft consensus algorithm.
io.permazen.kv.simple
A simple in-memory implementation of the KVDatabase interface.
io.permazen.kv.spanner
KVDatabase implementation based on Google Cloud Spanner.
io.permazen.kv.sql
KVDatabase implementations based on SQL connections.
io.permazen.kv.util
Utility classes relating to the KVDatabase interface.
io.permazen.kv.xodus
KVDatabase implementation based on Xodus.
io.permazen.schema
Classes for modeling Permazen Database schemas.
io.permazen.util
General utility classes used with Permazen.
  • Classes in io.permazen.util used by io.permazen.cli.config
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationClassLoader
    An URLClassLoader whose classpath can be modified at runtime.
  • Classes in io.permazen.util used by io.permazen.cli.parse
    Class
    Description
    ParseContext
    Utility class supporting parsing of strings.

    Description
    ParseContext
    Utility class supporting parsing of strings.
  • Classes in io.permazen.util used by io.permazen.core
    Class
    Description
    Bounds
    Utility class used by AbstractNavigableSet and AbstractNavigableMap to define the (optional) upper and lower bounds of a restricted range.
    ByteReader
    Reads bytes from a buffer.
    ByteWriter
    Writes bytes to a buffer.
    NaturalSortAware
    Implemented by Comparator classes that know whether or not their ordering is identical to the target Java type's natural ordering.
  • Classes in io.permazen.util used by io.permazen.core.util
    Class
    Description
    AbstractXMLStreaming
    Support superclass for classes that serialize and deserialize via XML.
    ImmutableNavigableSet
    An immutable NavigableSet implementation optimized for read efficiency.

    Class
    Description
    AbstractIterationSet
    Support superclass for Set implementations based on database entries.

    Support superclass for NavigableMap implementations based on database entries.
    AbstractNavigableSet
    Support superclass for NavigableSet implementations based on database entries.
    ApplicationClassLoader
    An URLClassLoader whose classpath can be modified at runtime.
    Bounds
    Utility class used by AbstractNavigableSet and AbstractNavigableMap to define the (optional) upper and lower bounds of a restricted range.
    BoundType
    Upper and lower bound types.
    ByteReader
    Reads bytes from a buffer.
    ByteWriter
    Writes bytes to a buffer.
    CloseableIterator
    An Iterator that is Closeable and can be close()'d without throwing any exceptions.
    Diffs
    Used to report difference(s) between two hierarchical structures.
    ImmutableNavigableMap
    An immutable NavigableMap implementation optimized for read efficiency.
    ImmutableNavigableSet
    An immutable NavigableSet implementation optimized for read efficiency.
    ParseContext
    Utility class supporting parsing of strings.
    ParseException
    Exception for parse errors associated with a ParseContext.
